value:
$nMPID_ミルラ|You've got dragon blood running
through your veins too, so you'll
live a long time, like me, Nah...$k$pWe can be friends forever and ever!

$nMPID_ンン|My clothes are so I match Myrrh!
Mother looked a bit jealous, so I plan
to make her some for next year.

$nMPID_ミルラ|Nah said I should chew on tree roots
if I get hungry, but...they don't taste
very good.

$nMPID_ミルラ|Are you curious what's in these eggs?
Well...that's our secret.

$nMPID_ンン|I polished both our dragonstones
until they shined. I'm not some
procrastinator—I come prepared!

$nMPID_ンン|I'm Nah, and this is my friend, Myrrh.
We've come to bring spring greetings
from $Nf!

$nMPID_ミルラ|The spring winds carry us forward.
Let us continue to grow stronger
while together.

$nMPID_ンン|Myrrh and I keep getting stronger.
Even if it's one step at a time, we'll
keep on growing!

$nMPID_ミルラ|It can take a long time for a manakete
to fully develop...

$nMPID_ンン|A gift of growth for spring, is it?
We both appreciate it!

I am Myrrh. This is Nah, a dear friend
of mine. I've so been looking forward
to the spring festival.

$nMPID_ミルラ|I must thank you, Nah. This is the
most fun I've ever had in springtime.
It's nice to not spend the time alone...$k$p$nMPID_ンン|Having lost my parents when I was
still very young, I understand how
you feel... It is nice to be together.$k$pAnd it's not just me you have with
you. There are other Heroes here,
and $Nu too!$k$pI know your father can't be replaced,
but...we'll make sure you never feel
so alone again!$k$p$nMPID_ミルラ|I am so happy I came to Askr and
was able to meet the two of you,
Nah, $Nu...$k$pLet's keep finding new ways to
celebrate spring from now on, so
we can keep being happy together...
Bunny dragon!
ROAR!
きゃああっ
痛いです…
何するです！
$nMPID_二人|Spring has sprung!
$nMPID_二人|"Let's go!" "It's time!"
$nMPID_ミルラ|Easy, spring breezy!
$nMPID_ンン|Get up!
I want to have more fun...
We can do this!
There's no way we'll lose!
"Leave it..." "To us!"
"We're bunnies!" "Uh...bunny sounds!"
Boing!
"Are these...bunny ears?" "Look, I've got some too!"
What is it?
Spring is here!
Perfect weather for a hop!
$nMPID_ミルラ|Hippity hop... Hippity hop...
$nMPID_ンン|What are you doing, Myrrh?
$nMPID_ミルラ|Oh... Um... I'm pretending to be a bunny.

$nMPID_ンン|Why would a dragon pretend to be
a bunny?

$nMPID_ミルラ|Well, we're dressed as bunnies... So
I thought we should act like them too.

$nMPID_ンン|I see. I guess I didn't expect to find you
playing pretend. You always seemed so
mature.

$nMPID_ミルラ|You're right. Maybe I got carried
away... Can we keep this between
us?

$nMPID_ンン|Oh, uh... But you make a great bunny!
Why hide it? *giggle*

In fact, if you need a buddy, then I'm
your girl. So let's...hop to it!

$nMPID_ミルラ|Oh, wow! I didn't know you could hop
so far in one leap!

$nMPID_ンン|We all have our talents, my friend. They
say practice makes perfect, so why not
have a race?

$nMPID_ミルラ|A race? That does sound kind of fun...
Where are we racing to?

$nMPID_ンン|Hmm... How about... Whoever can hop
to the summoner first is the winner!

$nMPID_ミルラ|Hehe, and whoever loses has to buy
sweets for the winner.

$nMPID_ンン|Oh, you're begging me to go all
out with a prize like that. I hope
you're ready...

$nMPID_ミルラ|Just wait until you see how much I've
been practicing... On your mark, get
set... Hippity hop!
$nMPID_ンン|Hippityyyyy... HOP!
